name: SERLER
description: Software Engineering Research Lab Evidence Repository (SERLER)

scripts.start: concurrently "cd api && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.predeploy:local: cd client && NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.test: cd api && npm test && cd ../client && npm run test:nowatch
scripts.postinstall: cd api && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && CI=false npm run build
